name: SmartplusInc
0:
”Alexa, turn on the living room curtain”
”Alexa, turn on the living room light”
”Alexa, turn on the bed room light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control your Smart plus devices with Alexa. 
To get started, "Enable Skill" in Alexa, and link your Smart plus account.

Supported Devices: smart plus lights, smart plus curtains
Supported Actions: turn on, turn off
for smart plus lights or curtains:
 turn on (turn off) the living room (lights)
